them you know do you have any research data to see where they're going to take because you put two things together there is a good chance they will not attack so that's the reason behind this research number two if you choose a good roof stock you usually have a enhanced Vigor and your yield usually be enhanced to be increased uh and also uh High tunnel has been getting popular and we use high of the cold seeding vegetables so grafting uh with correct roof stock you do enhance your s on um code hardness so just some background information for you okay um for this research what we did uh darkness and keep relatively high humidity and then after 7 to 10 days they are as normal if they take uh one lesson I learned from this year was uh the temperature even though it's not listed here
